returns._0: The parameter checker address (address(0) if none)

params.adapter: the adapter to get the targets from

returns.targets: an array of possible targes used by the adapter

params.target: The target address to check the type of

returns._0: type An array of allowed target addresses for the adapter

params.parametersChecker: The parameter checker contract address (0x0 to remove)

authorizeAdapterCall(address,bytes4,byte.notice: Check if an adapter is authorized to call a specific function on a target

getAdapterParametersChecker(address,addr.notice: Get the parameter checker for an adapter selector

getAdapterTargets(address).notice: Get the allowed targed to execute a transaction with

getTargetType(address).notice: Gets the type of an target

isAdapterSelectorAllowed(address,address.notice: Check if a selector is allowed for an adapter

setAdapterAllowedSelector(address,addres.notice: Set whether a selector is allowed for an adapter on a target contract

setAdapterParametersChecker(address,addr.notice: Set a parameter checker for an adapter selector

@notice Emitted when a selector is allowed or disallowed for an adapter
